sentences.english: I wish to assure you that, if successful, I would endeavor to give you every satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 如蒙不弃，惠予任命，本人将尽力办事，使诸事满意。

sentences.english: They sent a letter unto him, wherein was written thus; Unto Darius the king, all peace.
sentences.chinese: 本上写着说，愿大流士王诸事平安。

sentences.english: We have all experienced days when everything goes wrong .
sentences.chinese: 我们都曾经历过诸事庆幸的日子。

sentences.english: I would like to wish Sam and his family every success in the future.
sentences.chinese: 我祝愿赛姆和他的家人在未来诸事顺利。

sentences.english: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.
sentences.chinese: 我要求告至高的神，就是为我成全诸事的神。

sentences.english: Here are three suggestions to cheer you up when you're having a bad day.
sentences.chinese: 以下的三个提议，能让你在诸事不顺的日子心情一振。

sentences.english: And that's the end of the story of doing well, by doing good.
sentences.chinese: 这就是这个关于为善者诸事顺的故事的结局。

sentences.english: I cry out to God Most High, to God, who fulfills {his purpose} for me.
sentences.chinese: 我要求告至高的神，就是为我成全诸事的神。

sentences.english: And when everything is perfect, you escape such as thieves…
sentences.chinese: 诸事顺遂之时，如贼首般逃之夭夭。

sentences.english: And God will finish what He has begun.
sentences.chinese: 神作诸事向来有始有终。

sentences.english: We have all experienced days when everything goes wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我们都曾经历过诸事不利的日子。

sentences.english: So, I hope you'll remember the power of doing well by doing good.
sentences.chinese: 因而，我希望你们将记住为善者诸事顺这句话的力量。

sentences.english: It is futile to act for the benefit of beings without having embraced those acts with bodhicitta.
sentences.chinese: 若行利乐有情诸事，却无菩提心，也是徒劳。
于是建造城邑，诸事亨通。

definition: to plan matters/to look for a job
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
everything is going smoothly/just as one wishes
to do business/to manage/to strive for/to use every possible means (toward a goal)
to assist a ruler in governing a country/prime minister
